001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang;
002
003import static java.lang.Math.cos;
004import static java.lang.Math.pow;
005import static java.lang.Math.sin;
006import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
007
008import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
009
010import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
012
013
014/**
015 * Nonlinear optimizer based on the Levenberg-Marquart method, where the Jacobian matrix
016 * is calculated from analytic expressions (obtained with MatLab).
017 * 
018 * Part of this implementation is based on code from OpenIMAJ by J. Hare:
019 *     Copyright (c) 2011, The University of Southampton and the individual contributors.
020 *     All rights reserved (see https://github.com/openimaj/openimaj/).
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 */
024public class NonlinearOptimizerAnalytic extends NonlinearOptimizer {
025
026        protected NonlinearOptimizerAnalytic(Point2D[] modelPts, Point2D[][] obsPts) {
027                super(modelPts, obsPts);
028        }
029
030        @Override
031        MultivariateVectorFunction makeValueFun() {
032                return new ValueFun();
033        }
034
035        @Override
036        MultivariateMatrixFunction makeJacobianFun() {
037                return new JacobianFun();
038        }
039
040        private class JacobianFun implements MultivariateMatrixFunction {
041                /**
042                 * Calculates a "stacked" Jacobian matrix with 2MN rows and K = 7 + 6M
043                 * columns (for M views with N points each, K parameters). For example, 
044                 * with M = 5 views and N = 256 points each, J is of size 2560 Ã— 37.
045                 * Each pair of rows in the Jacobian corresponds to one point.
046                 */
047                @Override
048                public double[][] value(double[] params) {
049                        final double[][] J = new double[2 * M * N][];
050                        int r = 0;      // row
051                        for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {   // for all views
052                                for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {   // for all points
053                                        final double[][] Jij = subJacobian(i, j, params);
054                                        J[r + 0] = Jij[0];      // row 0 (x-coordinate)
055                                        J[r + 1] = Jij[1];      // row 1 (y-coordinate)
056                                        r = r + 2;
057                                }
058                        }
059//                      System.out.format("**** J = %d / %d\n", J.length, J[0].length);
060//                      System.out.println(NonlinearOptimizerAnalytic.class.getSimpleName() + 
061//                              ": Jacobian inverse condition number = " + MathUtil.inverseConditionNumber(J));
062                        return J;
063                }
064
065                /**
066                 * Calculates the sub-Jacobian for view 'i' / model point 'j' with the current 
067                 * parameter vector 'params' .
068                 * 
069                 * @param i the point index (= 0,...,M)
070                 * @param j the view index (= 0,...,N)
071                 * @param params the current parameters (of length K)
072                 * @return the two rows (2 x K sub-matrix) of the Jacobian for the given point
073                 */
074                private double[][] subJacobian(int i, int j, double[] params) {
075                        final double[][] A0 = new double[2][camParLength + viewParLength];
076
077                        final double X = modelPts[j].getX();
078                        final double Y = modelPts[j].getY();
079
080                        final double alpha = params[0];
081                        final double beta  = params[1];
082                        final double gamma = params[2];
083                        final double uc = params[3];
084                        final double vc = params[4];
085                        final double k0 = params[5];
086                        final double k1 = params[6];
087
088                        final double wx = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 0];
089                        final double wy = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 1];
090                        final double wz = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 2];
091                        final double tx = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 3];
092                        final double ty = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 4];
093                        final double tz = params[i * viewParLength + camParLength + 5];
094
095                        // begin matlab code
096                        final double t2 = wx * wx;
097                        final double t3 = wy * wy;
098                        final double t4 = wz * wz;
099                        final double t5 = t2 + t3 + t4;
100                        final double t6 = sqrt(t5);
101                        final double t7 = sin(t6);
102                        final double t8 = 1.0 / sqrt(t5);
103                        final double t9 = cos(t6);
104                        final double t10 = t9 - 1.0;
105                        final double t11 = 1.0 / t5;
106                        final double t12 = t7 * t8 * wy;
107                        final double t13 = t10 * t11 * wx * wz;
108                        final double t14 = t12 + t13;
109                        final double t15 = t7 * t8 * wz;
110                        final double t16 = t7 * t8 * wx;
111                        final double t18 = t10 * t11 * wy * wz;
112                        final double t17 = t16 - t18;
113                        final double t19 = Y * t17;
114                        final double t39 = X * t14;
115                        final double t20 = t19 - t39 + tz;
116                        final double t21 = 1.0 / t20;
117                        final double t22 = t10 * t11 * wx * wy;
118                        final double t23 = t3 + t4;
119                        final double t24 = t10 * t11 * t23;
120                        final double t25 = t24 + 1.0;
121                        final double t26 = alpha * t25;
122                        final double t27 = t15 + t22;
123                        final double t28 = t17 * uc;
124                        final double t29 = t2 + t4;
125                        final double t30 = t10 * t11 * t29;
126                        final double t31 = t30 + 1.0;
127                        final double t32 = gamma * t31;
128                        final double t45 = alpha * t27;
129                        final double t33 = t28 + t32 - t45;
130                        final double t34 = Y * t33;
131                        final double t35 = alpha * tx;
132                        final double t36 = gamma * ty;
133                        final double t37 = tz * uc;
134                        final double t40 = t15 - t22;
135                        final double t41 = gamma * t40;
136                        final double t42 = t14 * uc;
137                        final double t43 = t26 + t41 - t42;
138                        final double t44 = X * t43;
139                        final double t46 = t34 + t35 + t36 + t37 + t44;
140                        final double t47 = t21 * t46;
141                        final double t38 = -t47 + uc;
142                        final double t48 = 1.0 / (alpha * alpha * alpha);
143                        final double t49 = t38 * t38;
144                        final double t50 = t48 * t49 * 2.0;
145                        final double t51 = 1.0 / (alpha * alpha);
146                        final double t52 = X * t25;
147                        final double t57 = Y * t27;
148                        final double t53 = t52 - t57 + tx;
149                        final double t54 = t21 * t38 * t51 * t53 * 2.0;
150                        final double t55 = t50 + t54;
151                        final double t60 = beta * ty;
152                        final double t61 = beta * t40;
153                        final double t62 = t14 * vc;
154                        final double t63 = t61 - t62;
155                        final double t64 = X * t63;
156                        final double t65 = tz * vc;
157                        final double t66 = t17 * vc;
158                        final double t67 = beta * t31;
159                        final double t68 = t66 + t67;
160                        final double t69 = Y * t68;
161                        final double t70 = t60 + t64 + t65 + t69;
162                        final double t71 = t21 * t70;
163                        final double t56 = -t71 + vc;
164                        final double t58 = t49 * t51;
165                        final double t59 = 1.0 / (beta * beta);
166                        final double t72 = t56 * t56;
167                        final double t73 = t59 * t72;
168                        final double t74 = t58 + t73;
169                        final double t75 = 1.0 / (beta * beta * beta);
170                        final double t76 = t72 * t75 * 2.0;
171                        final double t77 = X * t40;
172                        final double t78 = Y * t31;
173                        final double t79 = t77 + t78 + ty;
174                        final double t80 = t21 * t56 * t59 * t79 * 2.0;
175                        final double t81 = t76 + t80;
176                        final double t82 = k0 * t74;
177                        final double t83 = t74 * t74;
178                        final double t84 = k1 * t83;
179                        final double t85 = t82 + t84;
180                        final double t86 = 1.0 / pow(t5, 3.0 / 2.0);
181                        final double t87 = 1.0 / (t5 * t5);
182                        final double t88 = t9 * t11 * wx * wz;
183                        final double t89 = t2 * t7 * t86 * wy;
184                        final double t90 = t2 * t10 * t87 * wy * 2.0;
185                        final double t91 = t7 * t86 * wx * wy;
186                        final double t92 = t2 * t7 * t86 * wz;
187                        final double t93 = t2 * t10 * t87 * wz * 2.0;
188                        final double t105 = t10 * t11 * wz;
189                        final double t106 = t9 * t11 * wx * wy;
190                        final double t94 = t91 + t92 + t93 - t105 - t106;
191                        final double t95 = t7 * t8;
192                        final double t96 = t2 * t9 * t11;
193                        final double t97 = t10 * t87 * wx * wy * wz * 2.0;
194                        final double t98 = t7 * t86 * wx * wy * wz;
195                        final double t103 = t2 * t7 * t86;
196                        final double t99 = t95 + t96 + t97 + t98 - t103;
197                        final double t100 = t10 * t29 * t87 * wx * 2.0;
198                        final double t101 = t7 * t29 * t86 * wx;
199                        final double t116 = t10 * t11 * wx * 2.0;
200                        final double t102 = t100 + t101 - t116;
201                        final double t104 = t7 * t86 * wx * wz;
202                        final double t107 = X * t94;
203                        final double t108 = Y * t99;
204                        final double t109 = t107 + t108;
205                        final double t110 = 1.0 / (t20 * t20);
206                        final double t111 = t10 * t23 * t87 * wx * 2.0;
207                        final double t112 = t7 * t23 * t86 * wx;
208                        final double t113 = t111 + t112;
209                        final double t117 = t10 * t11 * wy;
210                        final double t114 = t88 + t89 + t90 - t104 - t117;
211                        final double t115 = t94 * uc;
212                        final double t118 = t99 * uc;
213                        final double t119 = beta * t102;
214                        final double t262 = t99 * vc;
215                        final double t120 = t119 - t262;
216                        final double t121 = Y * t120;
217                        final double t122 = beta * t114;
218                        final double t123 = t94 * vc;
219                        final double t124 = t122 + t123;
220                        final double t263 = X * t124;
221                        final double t125 = t121 - t263;
222                        final double t126 = t21 * t125;
223                        final double t127 = t70 * t109 * t110;
224                        final double t128 = t126 + t127;
225                        final double t129 = gamma * t114;
226                        final double t141 = alpha * t113;
227                        final double t130 = t115 + t129 - t141;
228                        final double t131 = X * t130;
229                        final double t132 = -t88 + t89 + t90 + t104 - t117;
230                        final double t133 = alpha * t132;
231                        final double t142 = gamma * t102;
232                        final double t134 = t118 + t133 - t142;
233                        final double t135 = Y * t134;
234                        final double t136 = t131 + t135;
235                        final double t137 = t21 * t136;
236                        final double t143 = t46 * t109 * t110;
237                        final double t138 = t137 - t143;
238                        final double t139 = t38 * t51 * t138 * 2.0;
239                        final double t264 = t56 * t59 * t128 * 2.0;
240                        final double t140 = t139 - t264;
241                        final double t144 = t3 * t7 * t86 * wz;
242                        final double t145 = t3 * t10 * t87 * wz * 2.0;
243                        final double t146 = -t91 - t105 + t106 + t144 + t145;
244                        final double t147 = t3 * t7 * t86;
245                        final double t156 = t3 * t9 * t11;
246                        final double t148 = -t95 + t97 + t98 + t147 - t156;
247                        final double t149 = t10 * t29 * t87 * wy * 2.0;
248                        final double t150 = t7 * t29 * t86 * wy;
249                        final double t151 = t149 + t150;
250                        final double t152 = t9 * t11 * wy * wz;
251                        final double t153 = t3 * t7 * t86 * wx;
252                        final double t154 = t3 * t10 * t87 * wx * 2.0;
253                        final double t155 = t7 * t86 * wy * wz;
254                        final double t157 = Y * t146;
255                        final double t158 = X * t148;
256                        final double t159 = t157 + t158;
257                        final double t161 = t10 * t11 * wx;
258                        final double t160 = t152 + t153 + t154 - t155 - t161;
259                        final double t162 = beta * t160;
260                        final double t163 = t148 * vc;
261                        final double t164 = t162 + t163;
262                        final double t165 = X * t164;
263                        final double t166 = beta * t151;
264                        final double t267 = t146 * vc;
265                        final double t167 = t166 - t267;
266                        final double t268 = Y * t167;
267                        final double t168 = t165 - t268;
268                        final double t169 = t21 * t168;
269                        final double t269 = t70 * t110 * t159;
270                        final double t170 = t169 - t269;
271                        final double t171 = t56 * t59 * t170 * 2.0;
272                        final double t172 = -t152 + t153 + t154 + t155 - t161;
273                        final double t173 = alpha * t172;
274                        final double t174 = t146 * uc;
275                        final double t189 = gamma * t151;
276                        final double t175 = t173 + t174 - t189;
277                        final double t176 = Y * t175;
278                        final double t177 = t10 * t23 * t87 * wy * 2.0;
279                        final double t178 = t7 * t23 * t86 * wy;
280                        final double t190 = t10 * t11 * wy * 2.0;
281                        final double t179 = t177 + t178 - t190;
282                        final double t180 = gamma * t160;
283                        final double t181 = t148 * uc;
284                        final double t191 = alpha * t179;
285                        final double t182 = t180 + t181 - t191;
286                        final double t183 = X * t182;
287                        final double t184 = t176 + t183;
288                        final double t185 = t21 * t184;
289                        final double t192 = t46 * t110 * t159;
290                        final double t186 = t185 - t192;
291                        final double t187 = t38 * t51 * t186 * 2.0;
292                        final double t188 = t171 + t187;
293                        final double t193 = t4 * t9 * t11;
294                        final double t194 = t4 * t7 * t86 * wx;
295                        final double t195 = t4 * t10 * t87 * wx * 2.0;
296                        final double t196 = -t152 + t155 - t161 + t194 + t195;
297                        final double t197 = t4 * t7 * t86;
298                        final double t198 = t10 * t29 * t87 * wz * 2.0;
299                        final double t199 = t7 * t29 * t86 * wz;
300                        final double t204 = t10 * t11 * wz * 2.0;
301                        final double t200 = t198 + t199 - t204;
302                        final double t201 = t4 * t7 * t86 * wy;
303                        final double t202 = t4 * t10 * t87 * wy * 2.0;
304                        final double t203 = t88 - t104 - t117 + t201 + t202;
305                        final double t205 = t10 * t23 * t87 * wz * 2.0;
306                        final double t206 = t7 * t23 * t86 * wz;
307                        final double t207 = t196 * uc;
308                        final double t208 = t95 + t97 + t98 + t193 - t197;
309                        final double t209 = t203 * uc;
310                        final double t210 = -t95 + t97 + t98 - t193 + t197;
311                        final double t211 = alpha * t210;
312                        final double t231 = gamma * t200;
313                        final double t212 = t209 + t211 - t231;
314                        final double t213 = Y * t212;
315                        final double t214 = X * t196;
316                        final double t215 = Y * t203;
317                        final double t216 = t214 + t215;
318                        final double t217 = t196 * vc;
319                        final double t218 = beta * t208;
320                        final double t219 = t217 + t218;
321                        final double t220 = X * t219;
322                        final double t221 = beta * t200;
323                        final double t273 = t203 * vc;
324                        final double t222 = t221 - t273;
325                        final double t274 = Y * t222;
326                        final double t223 = t220 - t274;
327                        final double t224 = t21 * t223;
328                        final double t275 = t70 * t110 * t216;
329                        final double t225 = t224 - t275;
330                        final double t226 = t56 * t59 * t225 * 2.0;
331                        final double t227 = -t204 + t205 + t206;
332                        final double t228 = gamma * t208;
333                        final double t237 = alpha * t227;
334                        final double t229 = t207 + t228 - t237;
335                        final double t230 = X * t229;
336                        final double t232 = t213 + t230;
337                        final double t233 = t21 * t232;
338                        final double t238 = t46 * t110 * t216;
339                        final double t234 = t233 - t238;
340                        final double t235 = t38 * t51 * t234 * 2.0;
341                        final double t236 = t226 + t235;
342                        final double t239 = 1.0 / alpha;
343                        final double t240 = 1.0 / beta;
344                        final double t241 = t21 * t56 * t240 * 2.0;
345                        final double t242 = gamma * t21 * t38 * t51 * 2.0;
346                        final double t243 = t241 + t242;
347                        final double t244 = t21 * uc;
348                        final double t248 = t46 * t110;
349                        final double t245 = t244 - t248;
350                        final double t246 = t70 * t110;
351                        final double t285 = t21 * vc;
352                        final double t247 = t246 - t285;
353                        final double t249 = t38 * t51 * t245 * 2.0;
354                        final double t286 = t56 * t59 * t247 * 2.0;
355                        final double t250 = t249 - t286;
356                        final double t251 = k0 * t55;
357                        final double t252 = k1 * t55 * t74 * 2.0;
358                        final double t253 = t251 + t252;
359                        final double t254 = k0 * t81;
360                        final double t255 = k1 * t74 * t81 * 2.0;
361                        final double t256 = t254 + t255;
362                        final double t257 = t21 * t79;
363                        final double t258 = t21 * t79 * t85;
364                        final double t259 = k0 * t21 * t38 * t51 * t79 * 2.0;
365                        final double t260 = k1 * t21 * t38 * t51 * t74 * t79 * 4.0;
366                        final double t261 = t259 + t260;
367                        final double t265 = k0 * t140;
368                        final double t266 = k1 * t74 * t140 * 2.0;
369                        final double t270 = k0 * t188;
370                        final double t271 = k1 * t74 * t188 * 2.0;
371                        final double t272 = t270 + t271;
372                        final double t276 = k0 * t236;
373                        final double t277 = k1 * t74 * t236 * 2.0;
374                        final double t278 = t276 + t277;
375                        final double t279 = k0 * t21 * t38 * t239 * 2.0;
376                        final double t280 = k1 * t21 * t38 * t74 * t239 * 4.0;
377                        final double t281 = t279 + t280;
378                        final double t282 = k0 * t243;
379                        final double t283 = k1 * t74 * t243 * 2.0;
380                        final double t284 = t282 + t283;
381                        final double t287 = k0 * t250;
382                        final double t288 = k1 * t74 * t250 * 2.0;
383                        final double t289 = t287 + t288;
384                        // alpha
385                        A0[0][0] = t21 * t53 + t253
386                                        * (uc - t21 * (t34 + t35 + t36 + t37 + X * (t26 - t14 * uc + gamma * (t15 - t10 * t11 * wx * wy))))
387                                        + t21 * t53 * t85;
388                        // beta
389                        A0[0][1] = t38 * t256;
390                        // uc
391                        A0[0][3] = 1.0;
392                        // vc
393                        A0[0][4] = 0.0;
394                        // gamma
395                        A0[0][2] = t257 + t258 + t38 * t261;
396                        // k1
397                        A0[0][5] = -t38 * t74;
398                        // k2
399                        A0[0][6] = -t38 * t83;
400                        A0[0][7] = t137
401                                        - t143
402                                        + t38
403                                        * (t265 + t266)
404                                        + t85
405                                        * (t21
406                                                        * (X * (t115 - alpha * t113 + gamma * (t88 + t89 + t90 - t10 * t11 * wy - t7 * t86 * wx * wz)) + Y
407                                                                        * (t118 + alpha * (-t88 + t89 + t90 + t104 - t10 * t11 * wy) - gamma * t102)) - t46 * t109
408                                                                        * t110);
409                        A0[0][8] = t185 - t192 + t85 * t186 + t38 * t272;
410                        A0[0][9] = -t238
411                                        + t38
412                                        * t278
413                                        + t85
414                                        * t234
415                                        + t21
416                                        * (t213 + X
417                                                        * (t207 + gamma * (t95 + t97 + t98 + t193 - t4 * t7 * t86) - alpha
418                                                                        * (t205 + t206 - t10 * t11 * wz * 2.0)));
419                        A0[0][10] = alpha * t21 + t38 * t281 + alpha * t21 * t85;
420                        A0[0][11] = gamma * t21 + t38 * t284 + gamma * t21 * t85;
421                        A0[0][12] = t244 - t46 * t110 + t38 * t289 + t85 * t245;
422
423                        // alpha
424                        A0[1][0] = t56 * t253;
425                        // beta
426                        A0[1][1] = t257 + t258 + t56 * t256;
427                        // uc
428                        A0[1][3] = 0.0;
429                        // vc
430                        A0[1][4] = 1.0;
431                        // gamma
432                        A0[1][2] = t56 * t261;
433                        // k1
434                        A0[1][5] = -t56 * t74;
435                        // k2
436                        A0[1][6] = -t56 * t83;
437
438                        A0[1][7] = -t126 - t127 + t56 * (t265 + t266) - t85 * t128;
439                        A0[1][8] = t169 - t269 + t85 * t170 + t56 * t272;
440                        A0[1][9] = t224 - t275 + t85 * t225 + t56 * t278;
441                        A0[1][10] = t56 * t281;
442                        A0[1][11] = beta * t21 + t56 * t284 + beta * t21 * t85;
443                        A0[1][12] = -t246 + t285 - t85 * t247 + t56 * t289;
444                        // end of matlab code
445
446                        final double[][] Jij = new double[2][camParLength + viewParLength * M];
447                        System.arraycopy(A0[0], 0, Jij[0], 0, camParLength);
448                        System.arraycopy(A0[1], 0, Jij[1], 0, camParLength);
449                        System.arraycopy(A0[0], 7, Jij[0], camParLength + i * viewParLength, viewParLength);
450                        System.arraycopy(A0[1], 7, Jij[1], camParLength + i * viewParLength, viewParLength);
451                        //System.out.format("**** Jij = %d / %d\n", Jij.length, Jij[0].length);
452                        return Jij;
453                }
454        }
455
456}
